author: lasurr
content: Bunny Notes https://bunnynotes.financeBunny notes are verifiable claims to withdraw value deposited into smart contracts. The project leverages zero-knowledge proof technology to create notes that can be stored and transferred offline and store value.The protocol is useful for creating Gift-Cards, store crypto off-chain, create off-chain transfers and create Travel Rule compliant transactions by leaving a paper trail.Bunny notes are PDFs with qr codes that allows withdrawing value that was deposited.The protocol supports a token ZKB that can be used without fees. You can pick up some tokens on the website to support the project and use it without fees.Bunny Notes started out as a tornado cash fork without privacy features that won the Tron grand hackathon season 3 and it's sponsored by the Tron DAO. The protocol was created to explore use-cases of ZKP other than privacy.You can check it out without connecting your wallet.1. Visit bunnynotes.finance2. Watch the video for more information3. Select a currency to deposit and enter the denomination4. Download the bunny note!5. Connect the wallet and make a deposit if you want to deposit value to back the note6. Head over to verification and check the state of the note7. You can give this note to somebody and they can withdraw it using the withdraw page.Bunny Notes are a trustless protocol, only the owner of the Note has access to the deposits!Support by following the twitterhttps://twitter.com/BunnyNotes_Guyand try out the application at https://bunnynotes.finance You can find the whitepaper linked in the terms and conditions!Thank you !!
